name: Salah Simulator
description:
Salah Simulation game is a virtual game designed to simulate the experience of performing the Islamic prayer, also known as Salah or Salat. The game aims to provide players with an interactive and educational tool to learn how to perform the prayer correctly, as well as the necessary actions, words, and postures involved in each of the five daily prayers.

The game typically features a 3D virtual mosque environment, with a prayer mat, a mihrab, and other Islamic artifacts. The player is guided through the prayer by an on-screen avatar or instructor, who provides instructions and feedback on the player's performance.

In addition to the core gameplay, the salah simulation game may also provide educational content about the significance and benefits of performing Salah in Islam, as well as the proper etiquette and rules associated with the prayer. This can help players deepen their understanding and appreciation of the spiritual aspect of Salah.
